scripts.predev: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const iconsDir=path.join(__dirname,'public','icons');if(!fs.existsSync(iconsDir)){fs.mkdirSync(iconsDir,{recursive:true});console.log('Created icons directory');}const placeholderPath=path.join(iconsDir,'placeholder.txt');if(!fs.existsSync(placeholderPath)){fs.writeFileSync(placeholderPath,'Placeholder for PWA icons');}"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const iconsDir=path.join(__dirname,'public','icons');if(!fs.existsSync(iconsDir)){fs.mkdirSync(iconsDir,{recursive:true});console.log('Created icons directory');}const placeholderPath=path.join(iconsDir,'placeholder.txt');if(!fs.existsSync(placeholderPath)){fs.writeFileSync(placeholderPath,'Placeholder for PWA icons');}"
